snippet: New Tennessee athletic director John Currie has a five-year contract worth at least $900,000 annually with opportunities for raises and additional bonuses....

headline.main: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients
headline.print_headline: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients

lead_paragraph: New Tennessee athletic director John Currie has a five-year contract worth at least $900,000 annually with opportunities for raises and additional bonuses.
